# Contributing to TypeMorph

## How to Contribute

1. Fork the repository
2. Create a feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/tachanka`)
3. Make your changes
4. Run tests (`npm test`)
5. Commit (`git commit -m 'Add tachanka feature'`)
6. Push to your fork (`git push origin feature/tachanka`)
7. Open a Pull Request

## Development Setup

```bash
npm install
npm test
npm test:coverage
npm test:memory
npm run build
```

## PR Requirements

- ✅ All tests pass
- ✅ Code coverage doesn't drop
- ✅ Meaningful changes: refactoring, features...
